name: Ice Cold - A Chilling Serial Killer Thriller
name_original: Ice Cold - A Chilling Serial Killer Thriller
description:
Your cereal killer rival has recently been convicted for melting 4 snowmen.

You can do better than that!

 Break into an apartment building and use various light sources to melt your snowman victims, and beat your rival serial killer's victim count!

There's 3 endings to the game, Try to find them all!

---- WASD - Move---
---Mouse - Look---
---Left Mouse Button - Interact---
---Esc - Close game---

*Game will close automatically when an ending is reached*

This game was produced for the Game Technologies - Easter GameJam.
